description: ff. 10. 180 x 134; 143 x 104 mm. 18 lin. 12th cen. On fol. 1a and 10b four samāʻ notes, the oldest dat. Dhū al-Ḥijjah 589. Pt. 68 of al-Thaqafīʼs al-Fawāʼid al-ʻawālī; riwāyah of al-Silafī, takhrīj of ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAlī ibn Surūr al-Maqdisī (d. 600/1203: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 437). Incip.: ... اخبرنا الحافظ ابو طاهر ... السلفى الاصبهانى بثغر الاسکندرىة
author: Qāsim ibn al-Faḍl, 1006 or 1007-1095 or 1096
contributor: Jammāʻīlī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, 1146-1203
creator: Qāsim ibn al-Faḍl, 1006 or 1007-1095 or 1096
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
